short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to check Pushtimize integration on page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We use this extension to detect if our Ads SDK is included on the website.
Our members will install this extension, visit the publisher's website and use the extension to check if the Ads SDK is installed correctly.
